name: Waltzing Matilda Sunset Cruise
description:
Set sail from Airlie Beach on a sunset tour that promises to be a serene escape. This is your front-row seat to nature’s masterpiece.
Embark on a sunset voyage aboard Waltzing Matilda and witness the enchanting beauty of the Whitsundays Islands at sunset:
- Sail through Pioneer Bay.
- Marvel at the breathtaking sunset over the ocean.
- Relax with a drink and nibbles.
Suitable for solo travellers, groups, couples, families, and friends.
**Includes:**
- One complimentary glass of bubbles
- Spacious and comfortable deck area
- All inclusive (nothing extra to pay)
- Panoramic views of the Whitsundays and Airlie Beach
Available every Friday and Saturday.
**What to Bring:**
- A camera to capture the incredible sunset
- Sunglasses for when you set off
- Rain jacket (if needed)
Book your place today!
Embrace the serene allure of a Whitsunday Winter, where nature herself unfolds as your sanctuary amid the splendour of the untouched Whitsunday Islands.
includes: One complimentary glass of bubbles, spacious and comfortable deck area, all inclusive (nothing extra to pay), panoramic views of the Whitsundays and Airlie Beach
highlights:
Sail through Pioneer Bay
Marvel at the breathtaking sunset over the ocean
Relax with a drink and nibbles
Suitable for solo travellers, groups, couples, families, and friends
Spacious and comfortable deck area
ideal_for: Solo travellers, groups, couples, families, and friends

name: Private Double Cabin with Ensuite
description:
Enjoy the comfort and privacy of this stylish catamaran. Fully crewed with a skipper and hostess, Whitsunday Pearl is an ideal way to escape the crowds and let us take all the responsibility for the Charter. We will transport you into a relaxed world of sailing, taking you directly and comfortably to the most scenic locations, the least crowded beaches, and proven quiet calm safe anchorages.
**Includes:**
- Drinking water & ice
- Snorkelling – mask, snorkel, wetsuit, and floatation devices
- All marine park fees
- Visit Whitehaven Beach & Hill Inlet
- Great Barrier Reef snorkelling
- Intimate group sailing with 8 guests
- Lagoon 450 vessel, 14 meters in length and 8 meters in width
- Spacious decks, perfect for relaxing
- Four stylish double cabins with private ensuites
- Experienced skipper and host
- Stand-up paddle boards included
- Solar panels to power onboard appliances
- Wifi onboard powered by Starlink
- Charcoal filtered drinking water
- Onboard ice maker and coffee machine
**What to Bring:**
- BYO alcohol and drinks
- Water bottle to refill
- Sun protection (sunscreen, hat, sunglasses etc.)
- Warm clothes/pullover for evenings (seasonal)
**Additional Information:**
- A $20 surcharge may apply for some dietary requests and requirements.
- Peak holiday seasons (i.e., Christmas, Easter, New Years) may incur a surcharge.
departure_times: Coral Sea Marina - South End - Meeting Point C
includes: Drinking water, ice, snorkelling equipment, marine park fees, visits to Whitehaven Beach & Hill Inlet, Great Barrier Reef snorkelling, intimate group sailing, Lagoon 450 vessel, spacious decks, four double cabins with ensuites, experienced crew, stand-up paddle boards, solar panels, wifi, charcoal filtered water, ice maker, coffee machine.
highlights:
Stylish catamaran with private ensuite cabins
Fully crewed with skipper and hostess
Visit to Whitehaven Beach & Hill Inlet
Great Barrier Reef snorkelling
Intimate group sailing with 8 guests
Spacious decks for relaxation
Stand-up paddle boards included
Solar-powered onboard appliances
Wifi onboard with Starlink
ideal_for: Those looking for a private and intimate sailing experience on the Whitsundays with all the comforts of home.

name: Great Barrier Reef Education Experience Program
description:
Fresh from a remarkable $1 million makeover, Summer Jo combines the iconic Whitsunday hotspots, including Whitehaven Beach and diving on the Great Barrier Reef. This spacious mega yacht comfortably accommodates 32 passengers in various cabin types, including private, air-conditioned cabins with ensuite facilities. Ideal for solo adventure-seekers, friend groups, or families with older children! It’s your perfect home away from home in the Whitsundays.
Prepare to be wowed by Summer Jo’s stunning transformation. A brand-new million-dollar refit has breathed fresh life into this magnificent vessel. Dive enthusiasts, rejoice! We offer scuba diving with an incredible free scuba experience. Explore the mesmerizing depths of the Great Barrier Reef like never before. Retreat to your own cozy haven in our private, air-conditioned cabins. Comfort and tranquility await you.
Witness the southern allure of world-renowned Whitehaven Beach, a destination that’s nothing short of enchanting.
**Blue Pearl Bay Magic:**
- Set your sights on Blue Pearl Bay off Hayman Island, a pristine oasis brimming with underwater wonders.
- Savour mouthwatering meals lovingly prepared by our onboard chef. Culinary adventures await.
- Thanks to our desalinator, you can relish unlimited hot showers, a luxurious treat after a day of exploration.
- Dive into multiple snorkelling locations and uncover the vibrant marine life of the Whitsundays.
**Outer Great Barrier Reef Expedition:**
- Summer Jo stands among the select few vessels in Airlie Beach with the privilege to journey to the majestic Outer Great Barrier Reef.
- Leave the gear to us! We provide snorkelling masks and snorkels, ensuring you’re well-equipped for underwater escapades.
**Spacious Decks for Socialising:**
- Our expansive, open-plan decks are perfect for mingling and unwinding under the sun or stars.
- With a dedicated Dive Master onboard, you’re in expert hands for your diving adventures.
- Rest assured that Summer Jo is a locally owned vessel, driven by a passion for showcasing the beauty of our beloved Whitsundays.
includes:
- All meals (unless you require gluten-free, vegan or dairy-free meals)
- Snorkelling equipment, including masks and snorkels
- All diving can be decided on and paid for on board
- BYO Vessel – no glass, no red wine
highlights:
Iconic Whitsunday hotspots including Whitehaven Beach
Diving on the Great Barrier Reef
Spacious mega yacht accommodating 32 passengers
Private, air-conditioned cabins with ensuite facilities
Free scuba experience
Unlimited hot showers
Multiple snorkelling locations
Dedicated Dive Master onboard

name: 3 Days and 2 Nights on Solway Lass
description:
Solway Lass is a beautifully preserved tall ship with a rich history that you’ll feel the moment you step onboard. Today, she provides leisurely sailing tours around the islands. Expansive deck space, a licensed bar, air-conditioned cabins, and a comfortable saloon ensure guest comfort.
There is a fun rope swing and stand-up paddleboards adding to the excitement and adventure. You can help pull up some of the impressive 11 sails or take a turn on the helm. Whatever your age, Solway Lass is sure to deliver a unique experience and life-long memories.
Solway Lass offers flexible cabin configurations, fully air-conditioned cabins, meals served alfresco on the deck, a relaxing shaded canopy and afternoon happy hour to meet new friends and swap stories.
Welcome to the Whitsunday Islands – nature’s playground!  Immerse yourself in stunning beaches, coral, marine life, secluded bays, azure waters, bright orange sunsets, millions of stars and tranquil sunrises.
Experience this unforgettable adventure in the heart of the Whitsundays.
**Includes:**
- Services of skipper and crew
- All meals and snacks
- Tap water, tea and coffee
- Bath towel
- Standup paddleboards
- Snorkelling equipment and basic tuition
- Stinger suit
- All marina levies
**What to Bring:**
- Clothes
- Beach towel
- Toiletries
- Hat
- Swimwear
- Sunscreen
- Jacket/sweater
- Camera
- Sunglasses
- Running shoes or sandals for island walks
- Cash or credit card for onboard purchases
**Menu:**
- Cooked Meats, Wraps, Coleslaw and Salad (V: Kofta / Falafel)
- Butter chicken with rice (carrot, onion, beans, capsicum) (V: Vegetarian Tofu)
- Croissants, Cereals, Yoghurt, Spreads, Tea and Coffee
- Build your own Burgers with Fried Onions, Cheese, Pesto Pasta Salad and Mesclun Mix Salad (V: Vego Burgers)
- Spring rolls and quiche
- Baked Parmesan Fish with Potato Salad and Garden Salad (V: Vegetarian “fish”)
- Fruit Cake with Custard
- Cereals, Yoghurt, Fruit Bread, Spreads, Tea and Coffee
- Beef Tacos V: TVP
- Sunset Platter – Cheeses, Dips and Crackers, Vegetable Crudités, Kabana, Olives, Onions, Gherkins
departure_times: Arrive back at Airlie Beach at
includes: Services of skipper and crew, all meals and snacks, tap water, tea and coffee, bath towel, standup paddleboards, snorkelling equipment and basic tuition, stinger suit, and all marina levies.
highlights:
Sail on a beautifully preserved tall ship
Expansive deck space and licensed bar
Air-conditioned cabins and comfortable saloon
Fun rope swing and stand-up paddleboards

Stunning beaches and coral in the Whitsunday Islands
Beach activities at Whitehaven Beach
Afternoon snorkel and sunset views
Communal meals with fellow travelers

locations: Airlie Beach,Great Barrier Reef,Hook Island,Whitehaven,Whitsunday Island
itinerary:
**Day 1:**
After taking in the breathtaking views, jump back onboard as we head to Whitehaven Beach South for the afternoon. Head ashore for beach activities or relax as you feel that silica sand between your toes before Anchorage is at Whitehaven Beach for your first Whitsunday Island sunset.
**Day 2:**
Enjoy breakfast with Whitehaven Beach as your backdrop. After a hearty breakfast, head ashore for paddleboarding, and beach games. Or enjoy a walk up to Whitehaven Beach South lookout to take in the views from the opposite end of the beach. Lunch onboard as you sail north to one of the beautiful bays of Hook Island. Feeling energetic? Get involved with setting the sails or taking the helm. You will arrive in time to enjoy an afternoon snorkel before the golden hour as the sun sets over the Whitsundays for your last night. During dinner share your travel conversations with your new-found friends whilst on deck under the stars.
**Day 3:**
After lunch, it’s time to set the sails for the final time to make way across the Whitsunday Passage.

name: Whitsunday Getaway
description:
Enjoy the comfort and privacy of this stylish catamaran. Fully crewed with a skipper and hostess, Whitsunday Getaway is an ideal way to escape the crowds and let us take all the responsibility for the Charter. We will transport you into a relaxed world of sailing, taking you directly and comfortably to the most scenic locations, the least crowded beaches and proven quiet calm safe anchorages.
Arrive at Coral Sea Marina South – Meeting Point ‘C’ 2:30 pm to begin your Whitsunday Getaway experience. Your skipper and hostess will be waiting to greet you and welcome you aboard your floating home for the next few days. After a quick vessel safety briefing, we begin sailing effortlessly, passing through surreal island scenery. There is endless beauty to behold while underway and plenty to learn from your knowledgeable crew while you search for the perfect protected bay to drop anchor for the night. Guests are welcomed and encouraged to try their hand at sailing, and whether you are a beginner or a seasoned sailor, our experienced crew are always happy to share their love of sailing and the sea with others. You may also opt to relax with a refreshing drink instead, lapping up the luxury of the boat while the crew take over. Choose to do as little or as much as you like on this voyage, the world is your oyster!
As you enjoy pre-dinner drinks and get to know your fellow travellers, your hostess will be preparing your first gourmet meal. After dinner, continue relaxing with the company of your new friends, taking in the tranquillity surrounding you. When you’re feeling drowsy, take a last glance across the shimmering waters and turn in for the night in your comfy cabin, where you’ll be rocked to sleep by the gentle ocean swell.
Don’t sleep in – there’s too much to do! The crew are up early to make you a ‘cuppa’ and prepare your fabulous continental breakfast. After a pleasant and invigorating sail, it’s time to visit the euphoric Whitehaven Beach, with its remarkably pure silica sand. Experience first hand why this beach is often rated the most beautiful in the world! After enjoying a few hours on the beach, your hostess will take you on an informative guided bush walk up to the picture-perfect postcard that is Hill Inlet lookout. This view is not to be missed as it is a once in a lifetime opportunity to view the stunning and intriguing swirling sands that make Whitehaven’s Hill Inlet world-famous!
After a superb buffet lunch back onboard Getaway, we make our way up to the northern Whitsunday Islands to snorkel a vibrant underwater world filled with colour, life and beauty. When the evening sets in, so do the sails as we make our way to another spectacular anchorage to spend the night, reflecting on the day’s excursion.
Indulge in your final breakfast onboard Getaway and seize the opportunity for one last snorkel, or try your hand at stand-up paddleboarding. As we sail back towards Airlie Beach, soak up the raw beauty of our alluring island archipelago while relaxing on the spacious deck and forward outdoor lounge.
Upon returning to the mainland, we guarantee you will remember this once in a lifetime trip with a smile and fond memories of your adventures with us in the Whitsunday Islands. There we will say farewell, wishing you all the best in your future travels, knowing you’ll treasure the wealth of memories made in the Whitsundays for decades to come!
departure_times: Arrive at Coral Sea Marina South – Meeting Point ‘C’ 2:30 pm
includes:
- Fully crewed with a skipper and hostess
- Gourmet meals
- Continental breakfast
- Guided bush walk to Hill Inlet lookout
- Snorkeling equipment
- Stand-up paddleboarding

name: Great Barrier Reef Education Experience Program
description:
Step aboard our newly refitted mega yacht, now more luxurious than ever, with top-notch amenities for ultimate comfort.
Get ready for a social, action-packed journey filled with unforgettable moments of snorkelling and exploring the breathtaking Whitsundays.
**Includes:**

**Itinerary:**

- Set off from the Port of Airlie and cruise toward Tongue Bay.
- Get to know your fellow travellers while soaking in the stunning scenery and your first unforgettable Whitsunday sunset.
**Day 2:**
- Begin your day with a beautiful sunrise, a hot cup of coffee, and a delicious breakfast.
- Spend your final morning exploring your last snorkel and dive spots before we head back into port, ending your unforgettable Whitsundays journey.

name: Waltzing Matilda: 2 Day 1 Night Whitsundays Cruise
description:
Join us aboard Waltzing Matilda for an unforgettable sailing adventure, where the beauty of the Whitsundays is matched only by the warmth and comfort of your experience. Waltzing Matilda offers exclusive small group sailing adventures for an intimate and personalised experience. Ideally suited to chartering through these azure waters, Waltzing Matilda boasts comfort and style, ensuring every moment aboard is nothing short of magical.
Settle into our cosy, well-appointed spaces where every detail is taken care of with love. Waltzing Matilda’s spacious saloon and dining area warmly welcomed all 15 guests, allowing for shared meals and stories in a setting that felt like home. The vessel’s layout is thoughtfully designed to foster community and connection among guests, making each journey a unique experience.
With Waltzing Matilda, no two adventures are alike. Our journey is a tapestry of carefully chosen, idyllic island locations, each unveiling its piece of paradise. From secluded beaches to vibrant coral reefs, the Whitsundays are a treasure trove of natural wonders waiting to be explored.
**Includes:**
- Very knowledgeable, helpful and friendly crew
- Wide flat decks with shade awnings
- Meals prepared onboard using fresh local produce
- Snorkelling equipment and tuition provided
- All marine & park fees included
**What to Bring:**
- Warmer clothing (during the winter months)
- Sunscreen and a hat (during summer months)
- Hat and sun-safe clothing, swimwear and towel
**Departure Location:**
- Coral Sea Marina, Shingley Drive, Airlie Beach, QLD 4802
